attributes.action: Make Prisoners hate jail and for prisons to be more like horrible and hard working places.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prisons should not be places where people can have have a good time and live in luxury. Thet should have to do lots of physical actvity and they should  not have as manyrights as the public.Prisoners who commit severe offences should be tortured.
